#summary Introduction to pchart for mediawiki

=== What is pchart4mw ? ===
pchart4mw is a Mediawiki extension that enables you to create professional looking charts within a mediawiki page. With it you can create line-, bar-, pie-, radar-, scatter- and bubble charts. For example:
http://pchart4mw.googlecode.com/files/pchart4mw-line-02.png

=== How do I get started with pchart4wm ? ===
If you are a Mediawiki user and you're the administrator of your wiki site pchart4mw is for you. It is easy to install and use.
